Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 624 Drug Abuse Control

624.01Definitions. 624.02Gift of marihuana. 624.03Drug abuse; controlled substance possession or use. 624.04Possessing drug abuse instruments. 624.05Permitting drug abuse. 624.06Illegal cultivation of marihuana. 624.07Possessing or using harmful intoxicants.

624.08Illegally dispensing drug samples.

624.09Controlled substance or prescription labels.

624.10Hypodermic possession, display and dispensing.

624.11Harmful intoxicants; possessing nitrous oxide in motor vehicle.

624.12Drug paraphernalia.

624.121Marihuana drug paraphernalia.

624.13Counterfeit controlled substances.

624.14Offender may be required to pay for controlled substance tests.

624.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

See sectional histories for similar State law

Federal prosecution bar to local prosecution - see Ohio R.C. 2925.50, 3719.19

Analysis report and notarized statement as evidence - see Ohio R.C 2925.51

Criteria for granting probation - see Ohio R.C 3719.70(B)

Adulterating food with drug of abuse - see GEN. OFF. 636.16

Using weapons while under the influence - see GEN. OFF. 672.03.
